name: Breakfast Time (itch)
description:
Title: Breakfast Time

Platform: HTML

Genre: Text-Based Choose Your Adventure 

Target Market: 16+, Casual gamers,

Game Overview:

You wake up in the morning, hungry and disheveled. It is up for you to decide what you do, go eat, or go clean yourself up a little bit. What happens after that is on you. Follow your story through a carefully laid out path and try to not mess things up too much.

Eggs and a shower, what could go wrong?

Instructions: 

Click on the HTML link. A passage will appear with some options. Choose your path and continue through the story.

Game Design Team

Game Designer - Sage
